divs: sighting detailsmy alarm clock went off late and i frantically got dressed and loaded up my hunting gear (opening day for mass. bow season) in my car for the trip to my stand. evidently we had a frost overnight so i started up my car to warm it up (leaving the lights off as to not shine in the neighbors windows) and i went to retrieve a scraper from one of our other vehicles when a bright orange light caught my attention to the north. standing in the dark i could clearly see the rather large orange orb(?)with a pale white halo traveling due south,i would equate the speed and altitude to a low flying jet. somehow i had the presence of mind to run over to the car and shut it off to listen for any kind of jet\plane or helicopter report. what alarmed me the most was when i shut the car off there was no noise what so ever coming from the craft.... the light never varied in intensity, blinked or changed directions. within about 20 seconds it was gone from sight (one end of my visible horizon to the other, due south like a laser..)
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Northampton
There were no other sightings in Northampton on or around October 18th 2010
